overview: In 1988, German filmmaker Volker Schl√∂ndorff sat down with legendary director Billy Wilder (1906-2002) at his office in Beverly Hills, California, and turned on his camera for a series of filmed interviews. (A recut of the 1992 TV miniseries Billy, How Did You Do It?)
tagline: The wit and wisdom of one of Hollywood's most acclaimed filmmakers
title: Billy Wilder Speaks
